name: Liquid-Carbon
description: Matte dark-gray background with flat dark blue-slate trimmings, and colorful yet harmonious syntax highlighting. Screenshots available at: http://jeetworks.org/liquidcarbon .
install_details: Download/save/copy/move the file "liquidcarbon.vim" to your "$VIMRUNTIME/colors" directory (e.g., "~/.vim/colors"). Activate the color scheme by entering the command, ":colors liquidcarbon".
